revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Olimex |model=A20-OLinuXino-Lime |revision=2 (Rev K) e16Gs16M |asin=B00NWA4BCS |est_release_date=05/2016 |manuf_country=Bulgaria |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A20 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLMAG1JETD-B041 |fla2=16 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=25Q128JVSQ |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16HA-125:E |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), SATA, |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1), |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ9031RN |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1; ,,, 16Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;ATMLH82916CM;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;Advanced Monolithic Systems;AMS1117;;1;,,, 1.2MHz 2A Step Up Converter;Aerosemi;MT3608;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, Micropower Voltage Supervisor;Microchip;MCP121T-475I;;1; |flags=HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, LiPo battery connector, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2019.04; |stock_os=Linux;4.19.5; |tp_firmware=Armbian, Ubuntu 18.04, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=1234 |oui_eth=30:1F:9A }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/A20/A20-OLinuXino-LIME2/ Product page]
''"A20-OLinuXino-Lime2 Rev.K."'' is silkscreened on the board :(below the GPIO-1 connector). {{see also|Allwinner|List of Single-board computers}}
*[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OLinuXino#A20 ''OLinuXino A20'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Olimex_A20-OLinuXino-Lime2 ''Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime2'' on '''Linux-SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/05/04/olimex-a20-olinuxino-lime2-emmc-board-replaces-nand-by-emmc-flash-for-better-performance-reliability/ ''Olimex A20-OLinuXino-LIME2 Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A20 (Dual-Core ARM Cortex-A7) @1 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400'' *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM • Micron *Onboard Storage: 16GB eMMC, TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 3x USB 2.0, 1x SATA
===See also=== :;[https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/open-source-hardware ''Olimex'' Products] • [http://linux-sunxi.org/Category:Community_Devices ''Olimex'' Devices] *[[Olimex OLinuXino-MAXI]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-MICRO]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-MINI]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) :[[Olimex OLinuXino-NANO]] ([https://www.olimex.com/Products/OLinuXino/iMX233/open-source-hardware iMX233]) *[[Olimex A10-OLinuXino-Lime]] *[[Olimex A10s-OLinuXino-Micro]] *[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino]] :[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino-Micro]] :[[Olimex A13-OLinuXino WIFI]] *[[Olimex A13-SOM]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime]] :[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime2]] *[[Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Micro]] :[[Olimex A20 MICRO 8GB]] *[[Olimex A20-SOM]] :[[Olimex A20-SOM204]] *[[Olimex A33-OLinuXino]] *[[Olimex A64-OLinuXino-1G]] *[[Olimex AM3352-SOM-EVB]] *[[Olimex ARM-USB-TINY-H]]
